mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM gh_like WHERE board_id = #{boardNo}
mapper.update: update gh_board b inner join ( select board_id, count(*) as like_cnt from gh_like group by board_id ) l on b.board_id = l.board_id set b.likes = l.like_cnt
mapper.delete: delete from gh_like where board_id = #{boardNo} and member_id = #{memberNo}
